name: Spikes
summary: This is an entry-hazard that deals a set amount of damage. One layer of Spikes deals 1/8 damage, two layers deals 1/6, and three layers deal 1/4. Does not affect Pokemon with Levitate or are Flying types. Can be taken away if the opponent uses Rapid Spin, or if either side uses Defog.
viability: Spikes is a really good entry-hazard because of the consistent damage it deals. While not as common as Stealth Rock, it can hit Ground, Fighting, and Steel-type Pokemon for more damage.
